content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Foosball 2012 + DLC Bundle

Enjoy foosball on your PlayStation®Vita system. Play multiplayer matches, dominate the online leaderboards, or become a global champion in the single-player World Tour mode.

The Cross-Play feature will let you play against other players both on PlayStation®Vita system and PlayStation®3 system, while cross-saving will let you continue playing the game on your PlayStation®3 system where you left off on PlayStation®Vita system!

Whether you enjoy foosball regularly or have played it only briefly before, this game’s addictiveness and competitiveness will captivate you.

- Online multiplayer & global leaderboards.
- 9 different tables, 6 balls, and dozens of customization options.
- Play online against players on both PlayStation®Vita system and PlayStation®3 system!
- Game Continuation feature lets you start playing on PlayStation®3 system and continue on PlayStation®Vita system anywhere you go.



1-4 player(s)
Network Players 2-3
Network Features
256KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Motion Sensor
Cross-platform play (PS3™)

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account. 

GRIP DIGITAL S.R.O. & 3DIVISION S.R.O., 2012
attributes.name: Foosball 2012 Ultimate Foosball Bundle
